ygData.subject: Re: DrillBit and StarScream
ygData.msgSnippet: The spider crawled onto the wall above the door. It slowly, gently lowered itself above Drillbit. when the bot walked out it gently dropped onto his back.

Subject: Re: DrillBit and StarScream

The spider crawled onto the wall above the door. It slowly, gently 
lowered itself above Drillbit. when the bot walked out it gently 
dropped onto his back. There was only one hope to regain the trust of 
his former group. He had to regain his body. But in order to do that 
he had to regain the trust. He was trapped by a paradox. he had to 
break the loop. The only chance he had was to communicate. But not 
while he could be observed.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "I dont want to argue over this. I dont trust you Megatron, you 
left us
> to die once before. Killfest, I dont think she would say that."
> He turned to StarScream.
> "Lets go, StarScream. We will be better off on our own then with 
them."
> He took one last look at the corps of KitKat.
> "Good bye my love."
> He started to walk out.
> "Ok StarScream."
> As he walked past Killfest.
> "If you end up fighting Megatron, do me one favor, KILL HIM!"
